guesthouse.name: The Henry Guesthouse
guesthouse.tagline: We hope you have a wonderful stay

houseRules.title: No Smoking
houseRules.description: This is a non-smoking property. Please smoke outside and dispose of cigarette butts properly.

houseRules.title: Registered Guests
houseRules.description: Only registered guests are allowed to stay overnight, with a maximum of 2 Adult guests.

houseRules.title: Parties and Events
houseRules.description: Parties and events are not permitted on the property. Please respect our neighbors and keep noise levels to a minimum.

tasks: Please dispose of all trash in the bins provided
Load dirty dishes in the dishwasher
Return keys to the lockbox and ensure the property is securely locked

hostFavorites.name: Moreish Cafe - Modern Australian Breakfast
hostFavorites.specialty: House-made pastries, seasonal menu, excellent coffee
hostFavorites.tip: Weekend brunch gets busy - arrive before 9am!

hostFavorites.name: Mourning Roast - Coffee Culture
hostFavorites.specialty: Early morning & late night coffee, specialty blends
hostFavorites.tip: Great for early flights or late arrivals

hostFavorites.name: Rock'n'Roll Marketplace - Unique Food Shopping
hostFavorites.specialty: Artisan baked goods, fresh produce, gourmet items
hostFavorites.tip: Best coffee and fresh fruit/veg in the area!

restaurants.name: Uncle Lai's Malaysian Cuisine
restaurants.specialty: Famous Char Kuey Teow (CKT), Wat Tan Hor, authentic Malaysian hawker dishes
restaurants.tip: Featured in Brisbane Restaurant Bucket List 2019! Try the signature CKT with smoky 'wok hei' flavor

restaurants.name: Chili Coco
restaurants.hours: Lunch & dinner daily - Mon closed, Tue-Sun lunch 11am-2:30pm, Dinner Mon-Thu,Sun 4pm-9pm, Fri-Sat 4pm-9:30pm
restaurants.specialty: Generous family portions, Green Curry, Massaman Curry
restaurants.tip: Great for families - huge portions and good ambiance. Licensed venue.

restaurants.name: Taro's Ramen
restaurants.specialty: Brisbane's best ramen - Tonkotsu & vegan options
restaurants.tip: Famous across Brisbane for authentic ramen. Worth the walk!

restaurants.name: Stones Corner Hotel
restaurants.specialty: Heritage pub with bistro, bar with 16 beers on tap
restaurants.tip: Historic 1888 hotel, central to Stones Corner shopping precinct

quickBites.name: Noodle Box
quickBites.specialty: Chinese Combination, Honey Soy dishes, customizable noodle boxes
quickBites.tip: Quick Asian takeaway with wide variety of noodle and rice dishes

supermarkets.name: IGA Greenslopes
supermarkets.tip: Best hours - opens earliest and closes latest

laundromats.name: Excel Laundry Greenslopes
laundromats.features: Cash and card payments, on-site parking

laundromats.name: WaterSpirit Laundromat
laundromats.features: Card payments, free parking, next to Stones Corner Hotel

laundromats.name: eLaundry Stones Corner
laundromats.features: Eco-friendly dry cleaning, next to WaterSpirit

liquor.name: Kickon Bottleshop Stones Corner
liquor.specialty: Craft beer, wine & spirits, tastings, local & independent

transport.info:
Black & White Cabs: 133 222
Yellow Cab: 131 924
Uber & DiDi available

banking.name: Cashcard ATM
banking.location: Next to IGA Greenslopes Marketplace, 620 Logan Road

banking.name: Bank of Queensland ATM
banking.location: 304 Logan Road, Stones Corner (near Taro's Ramen)

localTips: Best for groceries: IGA opens earliest (6am) and latest (10pm)
24-hour needs: Hospital pharmacy 24/7, NightOwl and 7-Eleven also 24/7
Quick CBD access: Bus 180 is fastest (~14 min to Queen St)
Sunday shopping: Most places open with reduced hours
ATM: Cashcard ATM right next to IGA (very convenient), BOQ ATM near Taro's
Historic pub: Stones Corner Hotel (1888) - great for drinks and meals
